When resizing the window with acceleration disabled, the visible area turns into garbage, and tabs are painted in the wrong place. Scrolling up or down fixes the issue temporarily.

Card: NVIDIA Corporation -- NVIDIA GeForce 9400M OpenGL Engine -- 2.1 NVIDIA-1.6.26
